amendment.description: Amendment to the Torres amendment (A007) sought to reduce funding for the U.S. Army School of the Americas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate funding for the School of the Americas.

action.text: Substitute (A008) offered by Mr. Kennedy (MA) to the Torres amendment (A007).
On agreeing to the Kennedy (MA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 212 (Roll No. 448).
